title: Sports Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of sports, athletes, and sporting events from around the world.

questions.question: How many players are on a basketball team on the court at one time?
questions.explanation: A basketball team has 5 players on the court at one time.

questions.question: Which country won the FIFA World Cup in 2018?
questions.explanation: France won the 2018 FIFA World Cup, defeating Croatia 4-2 in the final.

questions.question: In tennis, what score comes after 40-40?
questions.explanation: In tennis, when both players reach 40 points, it's called 'deuce'.

questions.question: How many innings are in a standard baseball game?
questions.explanation: A standard baseball game consists of 9 innings.

questions.question: Which sport is played at Wimbledon?
questions.explanation: Wimbledon is the oldest and most prestigious tennis tournament in the world.

questions.question: What is the maximum score in a single frame of bowling?
questions.explanation: The maximum score in a single frame of bowling is 10 (a strike).

questions.question: Which country hosted the 2020 Summer Olympics?
questions.explanation: Japan hosted the 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo (held in 2021 due to COVID-19).

questions.question: In American football, how many points is a touchdown worth?
questions.explanation: A touchdown in American football is worth 6 points.

questions.question: Which sport uses a shuttlecock?
questions.explanation: Badminton uses a shuttlecock (also called a birdie) instead of a ball.

questions.question: How many players are on a soccer team on the field at one time?
questions.explanation: A soccer team has 11 players on the field at one time.

questions.question: Which country is famous for sumo wrestling?
questions.explanation: Sumo wrestling is Japan's national sport and has deep cultural significance.

questions.question: In golf, what is a score of one under par called?
questions.explanation: A birdie is a score of one stroke under par on a hole.

questions.question: Which sport is played on ice with sticks and a puck?
questions.explanation: Ice hockey is played on ice with sticks and a puck.

questions.question: How many rings are in the Olympic symbol?
questions.explanation: The Olympic symbol has 5 interlocking rings representing the 5 continents.

questions.question: Which country won the most medals at the 2020 Summer Olympics?
questions.explanation: The United States won the most medals (113 total) at the 2020 Summer Olympics.
